teachers.title: Professor Zarathustra
teachers.subtitle: Professor of French Letters
teachers.body: Regius Professor of French Letters at the University of Oxtail since 1904.

teachers.title: Lewis Carroll
teachers.subtitle: Primary school English and math teacher
teachers.body: Lewis comes from England. He has over 40 years teaching experience, and he takes a keen interest in artwork.

teachers.title: Albert Einstein
teachers.subtitle: Janitor
teachers.body: After getting very poor grades at school, Albert could not aspire to anything more than cleaning the school, a duty which he does satisfactorily.
